## Definice a Metriky

[Zdroj: V√Ωzkum Stanford University, "On the Dangers of Stochastic Parrots", 2023-2024]

D≈Øvodem je zmƒõna statistick√Ωch vlastnost√≠ re√°ln√Ωch dat oproti tr√©novac√≠m dat≈Øm (Data Drift). [Zdroj: Arize AI, "The Practitioner's Guide to MLOps", 2024, https://arize.com/resource-hub]
